message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm really interested in the product but $11,500 is a bit above my budget. I'd be happy to pay $10,500 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a little more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,750. This is my final offer.
